flawed_nl_solution:
It took 8*0.25=<<8*0.25=2>>2 years longer to go from chief to master chief than to get chief
So it takes him 8+2=<<8+2=12>>12 years to become a master chief
That means he took 12+8=<<12+8=20>>20 years to reach master chief from enlisting
So he was in the military for 20+10=<<20+10=30>>30 years
So he was 30+18=<<30+18=48>>48 when he retired
#### 48

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 10, not 12. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
